entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
